entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
